Sections.SectionText: I, Captain Sam, have started a journal to record my humble exploration of three tiny, uncharted planets.
I will be the first human to set foot on these planets - though not the first living creature, judging by the green.
Once I confirm these planets are suitable for human settlement, I will be named Terracom Employee of the Month, guaranteed!
I just have to make sure of this before I beam this discovery to HQ.
I can smell that holiday bonus coming from parsecs away.
It's a great way to fresh up the recycled oxygen in my helmet.
